name: MTC
description: Mote coin English abbreviation: MTC, by the famous Russian blockchain technology team, Created by Desheng and the top blockchain team in Southeast Asia, the fourth-generation encrypted digital currency jointly launched by many large communities in Asia was born in December 2022. It adopts the POC destruction proof of rights mechanism, aiming to create a fairer, more More practical, lower entry threshold, green and environmental protection, a fair, just, open and transparent super consensus mechanism that everyone can participate in
